name: World of Glitches
description:
This was made for Jame Gam 25. You play as a robot in a world where all the textures have been messed up! Dodge enemies and spikes to get to the end flag, with the help of the mystical powerup, buttered chicken, which slows down time so you have more time to react. But be warned, enemies are not affected by the slowdown of time.

 The controls are in the game.
